text: Nélida Romero (17 January 1926 - 14 January 2015) was an Argentine actress. She starred in the movies Madame Bovary (1947), Arroz con leche (1950), and The Honourable Tenant (1951). Romero was born in Lanús. She was married to the movie director Carlos Schlieper from 1944 to 1957. Romero died on 14 January 2015 in Buenos Aires, aged 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine stage actors Category:Argentine television actors
title: Nélida Romero
